title: Magnitude of average force exerted by racket

content.description: A 0.060 kg tennis ball moving at 15 m/s strikes a tennis racket and rebounds at 10 m/s in the opposite direction, as shown above. The ball is in contact with the racket for 0.030 s.
content.question: What is the magnitude of the average force exerted by the racket on the ball?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
